transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello Hello Hello

Customer: Haan ji sir aawaj aa rahi hai?

Executive: Haan ji haan ji bataiye bataiye sir.

Customer: Uh, yeh keh raha hu yaar ki response aa nahi raha. Kya aisa ho sakta hai ki hum baki keyword hata de?

Customer: Jo table wagera conference wagera woh hata de khali chair chair mein rakhe?

Executive: Sir chair chair sara hataiyega sir.

Customer: Achha haan. To ek baar main sir se nahi hai main soch raha hu.

Customer: Kyunki main jo hamara hai.

Customer: Hamari jo manufacturing hai.
Executive: Chair chair mein haan aap hai to aap.
Customer: Haan. Nahi aapne pehle hi bataya sir sirf aapko chair chair kare na.

Customer: Haan chair school desk ye sab table modular workstation ye sab hata dena hai.

Customer: Achha. Kyunki mujhe lagta hai ho sakta hai ki inquiry aisi aati hai woh hamare kaam ki na ho.

Customer: Aur phir hum interest lete nahi hai.

Customer: To jarur dal mein response achha hai.
Executive: Main ek kaam karta hu sir.

Executive: Main ek baar sir se baat kar leta hu ki agar change karenge to sahi rahega ki nahi.

Customer: To abhi aap free ho aadhe ghante mein?
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Haan haan free hu.

Executive: Haan to main ek baar sir se pehle discussion kar leta hu ki aisa karna karana chahte ho koi issue to nahi hoga. Theek hai to uske baad main aapko video meeting pe bula kar ke na.
Customer: Haan hamare end pe hai. Woh to hum khud hi chahe to hata sakte hain jo jo keyword lena hai woh le sakte ho jo nahi hai usko hata sakte ho.
Customer: Nahi nahi hata to sir main bhi dunga aap bhi hata doge lekin main ek baar woh confirm kar leta hu ki matlab ki agar hatane ke baad aisa na ho ki aapka matlab business kam aane lage.

Customer: Saari cheez ek baar dekh lunga na.
Executive: Theek hai. Mera manna hai business bhale hi kam aaye. Aap samjhe mera manna yeh hai ki jo bhi lead aaye woh genuine ho matlab duniya bhar ki leadon ka karna kya hai din ki ek lead aaye lekin genuine aaye.

Customer: Achha achha do lead aaye chalo theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai to main aapko video meeting pe bula kar ke na main saari cheez woh hatwa deta hu phir. Kyunki main aise karunga to phir haan to phir to dikkat ho jayega. To main abhi office matlab ki pahunchne hi wala hu main thoda late ho gaya.
Customer: Koi nahi aap salah le lo apne senior se salah leke phir batao.

Executive: Main aapko 10 se 15 minute mein karta hu phir video meeting pe aate hain sir theek hai.

Customer: Theek hai sir theek hai.

Executive: Theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting good responses.

- Wants to remove some keywords.



Resolution:

- Executive will discuss with his senior.

- Executive will call the customer for video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call in 10-15 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- keywords, buyleads, video meeting
